statements: SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData;
SELECT id, efficiency FROM SolarPanelData WHERE placement='Roof';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData WHERE maintenance_schedule='Monthly' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, placement FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, maintenance_schedule FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency < 0.6;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency > 0.75 ORDER BY placement DESC;
SELECT id, efficiency FROM SolarPanelData WHERE placement = 'Roof' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, placement, maintenance_schedule FROM SolarPanelData WHERE maintenance_schedule  LIKE '%Quarterly%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, efficiency, placement FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency < 0.6 OR placement = 'Ground' ORDER BY efficiency ASC, placement DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData WHERE maintenance_schedule IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT efficiency, maintenance_schedule FROM solar_panels ORDER BY efficiency desc;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE panel_id = 3;
SELECT placement, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE placement = 'Roof' ORDER BY efficiency asc;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT placement, efficiency FROM solar_panels ORDER BY placement DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE placement LIKE '%rooftop%' AND maintenance_schedule = 'monthly';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE panel_id = 5 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT s.placement, m.maintenance_date FROM solar_panels s JOIN maintenance_logs m ON s.id = m.panel_id WHERE m.maintenance_description LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT * FROM efficiency;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rate FROM efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rate DESC;
SELECT location, orientation FROM placement WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT panel_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM efficiency WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT efficiency_rate FROM efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rate DESC;
SELECT location, orientation FROM placement WHERE location = 'rooftop';
SELECT panel_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT panel_id, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT efficiency, placement FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT panel_id, reading_timestamp, efficiency FROM EfficiencyData ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM PlacementData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -90;
SELECT panel_id, schedule, next_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT id, efficiency, placement FROM SolarPanels WHERE placement = 'Roof';
SELECT SolarPanels.id, EfficiencyData.efficiency, reading_timestamp FROM SolarPanels JOIN EfficiencyData ON SolarPanels.id = EfficiencyData.panel_id;

SELECT EfficiencyData.efficiency, PlacementData.latitude, PlacementData.longitude FROM EfficiencyData JOIN PlacementData ON EfficiencyData.panel_id = PlacementData.panel_id WHERE EfficiencyData.efficiency > 0.9;
SELECT id, schedule, next_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Efficiency;
SELECT manufacturer, panel_name, installation_date FROM SolarPanel ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_value FROM Efficiency WHERE efficiency_value > 0.8;
SELECT location, panel_id FROM Placement WHERE location LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, maintenance_type FROM Maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanel WHERE manufacturer = 'SunPower';
SELECT panel_name, installation_date FROM SolarPanel ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT Efficiency.panel_id, efficiency_value, maintenance_type FROM Efficiency JOIN Maintenance ON Efficiency.panel_id = Maintenance.panel_id;
SELECT PanelStatus.status, PanelStatus.panel_id, SolarPanel.panel_name FROM PanelStatus LEFT JOIN SolarPanel ON PanelStatus.panel_id = SolarPanel.id;
SELECT Efficiency.panel_id, AVG(efficiency_value) AS avg_efficiency FROM Efficiency GROUP BY Efficiency.panel_id HAVING AVG(efficiency_value) > 80;
